title: Leona skin combo price?
body:
After entering the store today i saw i could buy the two new individual Leona skins (Solar Eclipse Leona|Lunar Eclipse Leona) for 2821 RP  yet i don't know of or see any discounts to buy them . 
Am I missing something or is this a fault somewhere?

replies.body: Do you own the champion? If you don't own Leona the bundle will factor in the RP cost of the champion.
